short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for the Agfa Jenkins server, which copies the page URL into your clipboard as a breadcrumb style address

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to copy the page URL into your clipboard as a bread-crumb style address. It will also add common links (testReport and console) for each build listed under a folder in Jenkins.
